machine_start_gcode.default_value:
;----------AXIS Start G-code---------- 
T0 
M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} ;Set hotend temp. 
M140 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} ;Set bed temp. 
M109 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} ;Wait for hotend 
M190 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} ;Wait for heated bed 
G28 ;Home 
M420 S1 Z4 ;Activate auto-level and set Z-fade. 
G1 F8000 X10 Y3 ;Move hotend to bottom left corner 
G1 Z{layer_height_0} ;Set to first layer height 
M82 ;absolute extrusion mode 
G92 E0 ;Zero Extruder 
G1 F1500 X290 E12 ;Prime Hotend 
; ----------AXIS start G-code----------

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
G91 ;Relative postioning
G1 Z5 F600 ;Raise Hotend
G90 ;Absolute postioning
G28 X Y ;Home and present print
M104 S0 ;Hotend off
M140 S0 ;Bed off
M84 ;Motors off
